body.p:
Kenton Co Ky
April 8th 1863 --
Hon D C. Wickliffe

Dear Sir -- I herewith send you a petition for the remittance of a fine against Mr Jno Dempsey, he lives near me & I know him to be an industrious, moral and well behaved man. he is very poor & to pay the full fine would certainly distress him greatly. he has already paid $25. that amount covering the cost. I therefore hope you will see the Govenor & have the balance remitted with me at Crittenden Ky --
